showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // {Cloud}
“Guess I shouldn't have
worried about it.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:3}); // {Cloud}
“{Tifa}, you'll be alright now.”

“Yeah, sorry I made you worry.
I solved the mystery.”

“I think I overdid it a little, too.”
